items.title: More than 2,000 people reported killed at Iran protests as Trump says 'help is on its way'
items.title_zh: 超过两千人在伊朗抗议活动上丧生,
items.summary: More than 2,000 people have been killed during the violent crackdown by security forces on protests in Iran, a human rights group has said, as President Trump promised Iranians that help was "on its way".
items.summary_zh: 一个人权团体说,在安全部队对伊朗的抗议活动进行暴力镇压期间,有2000多人死亡,正如特朗普总统向伊朗人承诺的帮助"在路上".

items.title: We choose Denmark over US, Greenland's PM says
items.title_zh: 我们选择丹麦而不是美国 格陵兰首相说
items.summary: Greenland's prime minister has said his people would choose Denmark over the US if they were asked to make such a choice "here and now".
items.summary_zh: 格陵兰总理表示,如果要求丹麦人做出这样的选择,他的人民会选择丹麦而不是美国,"现在在这里".

items.title: トランプ大統領「抗議を続けろ 機関を掌握せよ」イラン国民に
items.title_zh: 特朗普总统致伊朗的“抗议联盟”
items.summary: “イラン反政府デモ 死者約2000人に” ロイター通信
items.summary_zh: “伊朗反政府民主:大约2000起死亡事件”,路透社

items.title: 北日本を中心に大荒れの天気 猛吹雪による交通影響などに警戒
items.title_zh: 粗糙天气的天气主要在日本北部
items.summary: 高市首相 きょう与党幹部と会談し衆院解散の意向伝達か
items.summary_zh: 日本政府主席高一先生

items.title: 'Now there's the threat of executions' in Iran
items.title_zh: 现在伊朗有处决的威胁
items.summary: Anti-government protests have continued in Iran with thousands feared dead after the government crackdown on demonstrators.
items.summary_zh: 伊朗国内持续有反政府抗议活动,

items.title: 韓国 ユン前大統領に死刑求刑 被告は無罪主張 来月19日に判決
items.title_zh: 韩国前总统云的死讯 下个月被告无罪判决
items.summary: 韓国 ユン前大統領に死刑求刑 内乱を首謀した罪の裁判
items.summary_zh: 韩国前总统云的死讯

items.title: 高市首相 きょう与党幹部と会談し衆院解散の意向伝達か
items.title_zh: 日本政府主席高一先生
items.summary: 通常国会23日に召集 “解散の見方広がる” 与野党 13日の動き
items.summary_zh: 关于“扩大如何解散”约诺党第13运动的大会

items.title: デンマークとアメリカ グリーンランドめぐり14日に会談へ
items.title_zh: 在丹麦和美国与第十四届格陵兰会议会面
items.summary: トランプ氏 “グリーンランドの防衛は犬ぞりだ” 強化を主張
items.summary_zh: 特朗普的“绿地防御就是狗滑翔 ” , 坚持强化

items.title: “ウクライナ 去年の民間人の死者2500人以上” 国連人権監視団
items.title_zh: “去年的2 500多名乌克兰人”
items.summary: 【随時更新】ロシア ウクライナに軍事侵攻（1月13日の動き）
items.summary_zh: 俄罗斯军事入侵乌克兰(1月13日)

items.title: Republicans vow to hold Bill Clinton in contempt as he skips Epstein testimony
items.title_zh: 共和党人发誓,当比尔·克林顿不听爱泼斯坦的证词时,他藐视法庭
items.summary: A Republican lawmaker is vowing to begin contempt-of-Congress proceedings against former President Bill Clinton after he failed to show up on Tuesday to testify before a committee investigating Jeffrey Epstein.
items.summary_zh: 一名共和党议员在周二未能到调查杰弗里·爱泼斯坦的委员会出庭作证后,誓言开始对前总统比尔·克林顿的藐视国会诉讼.

items.title: Prosecutors seek death penalty for ex-South Korean president Yoon
items.title_zh: 检察官要求韩国前总统尹某死刑
items.summary: Prosecutors have asked for South Korea's former president Yoon Suk Yeol to be handed a death sentence if he is found guilty over his botched attempt to impose martial law.
items.summary_zh: 检察官要求韩国前总统尹淑烈被判死刑,

items.title: Controversial Dilbert cartoonist Scott Adams dies aged 68
items.title_zh: 有争议的Dilbert漫画家Scott Adams去世68岁
items.summary: Scott Adams, the US cartoonist who wrote and illustrated the comic strip Dilbert, has died of cancer at the age of 68.
items.summary_zh: 美国漫画家史考特·亚当斯(Scott Adams)写出并描绘了漫画"迪尔伯特"(Dilbert),他已经死于癌症,享年68岁.

items.title: Le Pen blames European Parliament in appeal that could decide political fate
items.title_zh: Le Pen责备欧洲议会上诉,
items.summary: French far-right leader Marine Le Pen has told a Paris court she hopes will overturn her conviction for embezzling EU funds that she had "no sense of having committed an offence".
items.summary_zh: 法国极右派领袖Marine Le Pen已经告诉一个巴黎法庭,她希望能够推翻她挪用欧盟资金的定罪,她"没有犯罪的感觉".

items.title: Bowen: Authoritarian regimes die gradually then suddenly, but Iran is not there yet
items.title_zh: 博文:独裁政权逐渐消亡,但伊朗尚未到来
items.summary: How does an authoritarian regime die? As Ernest Hemingway famously said about going broke – gradually then suddenly.
items.summary_zh: 专制政权如何消亡? 正如欧内斯特·海明威(Ernest Hemingway)所出名地说的那样,要破产了 — — 然后逐渐地突然。

items.title: Trump administration moves to end deportation protection for Somalis
items.title_zh: 特朗普政府采取行动结束对索马里人的驱逐保护
items.summary: The Trump administration is ending Temporary Protected Status (TPS) for Somali immigrants, making it easier to deport thousands of people from the US.
items.summary_zh: 特朗普政府即将结束索马里移民的临时被保护地位(TPS),

items.title: BTS stand to make $1bn as they announce mammoth comeback tour
items.title_zh: BTS在宣布猛毛羊回来巡回演唱会时要赚一分钱
items.summary: K-pop idols BTS have announced a globe-spanning, 79-date world tour, marking their return to the stage after a four-year hiatus.
items.summary_zh: K-pop偶像 BTS宣布出道全球出道 79日世界巡回演唱会 标志着他们在四年间歇后重返舞台.

items.title: 第174回芥川賞・直木賞 きょう選考会 候補作は 作家の経歴も
items.title_zh: 第174届秋川奖/直木奖
items.summary: 洋画家 東郷青児が描いた芥川龍之介の似顔絵が見つかる
items.summary_zh: 西式画家Seiji 多哥为秋田川龙之子画了一幅相片

items.title: World central bank chiefs 'stand in solidarity' with US Fed chair Powell
items.title_zh: 世界央行行长与美国联邦主席鲍威尔“团结一致”
items.summary: Central banks across the world have joined together to declare that they stand in "full solidarity" with the Federal Reserve's chair after the US launched a criminal investigation into Jerome Powell.
items.summary_zh: 世界各国的中央银行联合起来,宣布在美国对杰罗姆·鲍威尔发起刑事调查后,它们与美联储主席站在一起"完全团结".

items.title: Senator Mark Kelly sues Defence Secretary Pete Hegseth over attempted demotion
items.title_zh: 参议员马克·凯利控告国防部长皮特·赫格塞斯 企图降职
items.summary: US Senator Mark Kelly has sued Defence Secretary Pete Hegseth, arguing that the Pentagon illegally tried to demote him in retaliation for criticising the Trump administration.
items.summary_zh: 美国参议员马克·凯利已起诉国防部长皮特·赫格塞斯,认为五角大楼非法试图降级以报复批评特朗普政府.

items.title: Which countries do business with Iran and what could US tariffs mean?
items.title_zh: 哪些国家与伊朗做生意,美国关税意味着什么?
items.summary: US President Donald Trump has said countries doing business with Iran will face a 25% tariff on trade they do with America.
items.summary_zh: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普(Donald Trump)表示,与伊朗做生意的国家将面临对美国贸易25%的关税.

items.title: Hunt for gunman after Corsican exile is shot dead at mother's funeral
items.title_zh: 在柯西肯被放逐后为枪手打猎 在母亲葬礼上被枪杀
items.summary: Organised crime prosecutors on the French island of Corsica are investigating the killing of former separatist leader Alain Orsoni, who was shot dead while attending his mother's funeral.
items.summary_zh: 法国科西嘉岛的有组织犯罪检察官正在调查杀害前分离主义领导人阿兰·奥尔索尼的事件,他在参加他母亲的葬礼时被枪杀.

items.title: Cold weather and data centres drive up US greenhouse gas emissions
items.title_zh: 寒冷的天气和数据中心导致美国温室气体排放增加
items.summary: A very cold start to 2025 and the growing power demands of data centres and cryptocurrencies saw US emissions of planet-warming gases rise for the first time in three years, a new analysis shows.
items.summary_zh: 一个非常寒冷的开始到2025年,数据中心和密码的电能需求不断增长,美国在三年内首次增加了地球升温气体的排放量,新的分析显示。

items.title: Niger revokes licences of tanker drivers who refuse to go to Mali amid jihadist blockade
items.title_zh: 尼日尔吊销在圣战封锁下拒绝前往马里的油轮司机的执照
items.summary: Niger has revoked the licences of dozens of transport operators and drivers for refusing to deliver fuel to neighbouring Mali where they face possible attacks by jihadists.
items.summary_zh: 尼日尔已吊销数十名运输运营商和司机的执照,因为他们拒绝向邻近的马里运送燃料,在那里他们可能遭到圣战者的袭击。

items.title: How Australian festival imploded after axing Palestinian author
items.title_zh: 澳大利亚的节日在巴勒斯坦作者被砍后是如何破裂的
items.summary: One of Australia's biggest cultural festivals has been left in disarray after a decision to disinvite a prominent Australian-Palestinian writer, triggering a massive backlash, a mass exodus from fellow authors – and the ultimate cancellation of the festival's Writers' Week.
items.summary_zh: 澳大利亚最大的文化节之一,在决定取消一位澳大利亚-巴勒斯坦著名作家的提名后,陷入了混乱之中,引发了一场大规模的反弹和来自同名作者的大规模出走 — — 最终取消了该节作家的提名。 礼拜.

items.title: Rubbish landslide death toll in Philippines rises to 11
items.title_zh: 菲律宾垃圾地崩死亡人数增至11人
items.summary: The death toll in a collapsed landfill in the central Philippines has risen to 11, authorities said.
items.summary_zh: 菲律宾中部一个倒塌的垃圾填埋场死亡人数已增至11人,

items.title: Pioneering gay footballer Josh Cavallo accuses former club of homophobia
items.title_zh: 先入为主的同性恋足球运动员Josh Cavallo 指责前俱乐部仇视同性恋
items.summary: Joshua Cavallo - the first man to come out as gay while playing top-tier football - has alleged he was pushed out of his former club due to "internal homophobia".
items.summary_zh: 约书亚·卡瓦略(Joshua Cavallo)是第一位在踢顶级足球时以同性恋身份出场的男子,他称自己被"内部恐同"赶出了以前的俱乐部.

items.title: Key questions for FBI investigators to unpick in Minneapolis shooting
items.title_zh: 联邦调查局调查员在明尼阿波利斯枪击案上解开的关键问题
items.summary: US federal investigators will face a host of thorny questions in determining whether the fatal shooting of a woman by a federal agent in Minneapolis last week was justified, experts have told the BBC.
items.summary_zh: 美国联邦调查员将面临许多棘手的问题,以确定上周在明尼阿波利斯的联邦特工杀害一名妇女是否合理,专家们已经告诉了英国广播公司。

items.title: Will voters in one of the world's youngest countries give an 81-year-old another term?
items.title_zh: 世界最年轻国家之一的选民会给一个81岁又一个任期吗?
items.summary: Whether decked in the bright yellow of the ruling party or donning the revolutionary red of the main opposition, young people are dominant among the foot soldiers of Uganda's election campaign.
items.summary_zh: 无论是在执政党的明亮黄色中,还是在主要反对派的革命红色中,年轻人在乌干达竞选运动的脚兵中占据主导地位.

items.title: 'We were tricked': How one woman lures foreign men to fight on Russia's front line
items.title_zh: "我们被骗了": 一个女人如何引诱外国男人 在俄国前线作战
items.summary: Flames lick around the edges of Omar's passport. "It's burning well," an unseen woman says in Russian in the video.
items.summary_zh: 火焰在Omar的护照边上舔去 一个看不见的女人在视频中用俄语说,

items.title: Trump to meet Venezuelan opposition leader Machado at the White House
items.title_zh: 特朗普在白宫会见委内瑞拉反对派领袖马查多
items.summary: Venezuelan opposition leader and Nobel Peace Prize winner María Corina Machado will meet President Donald Trump on Thursday, the White House has confirmed.
items.summary_zh: 委内瑞拉反对派领袖和诺贝尔和平奖得主玛丽亚·科琳娜·马查多将在星期四会见总统唐纳德·特朗普,白宫已经确认.

items.title: 'They just kept killing': Eyewitnesses describe deadly crackdown in Iran
items.title_zh: "他们一直在杀人": 目击者描述伊朗的致命镇压
items.summary: "I saw it with my own eyes - they fired directly into lines of protesters, and people fell where they stood."
items.summary_zh: "我亲眼目睹——他们直接射入抗议者一行,人们倒地而下".

items.title: Lyse Doucet: Iran's rulers face biggest challenge since 1979 revolution
items.title_zh: Lyse Doucet:1979年革命以来伊朗统治者面临的最大挑战
items.summary: Iran's rulers are confronting their most serious challenge since their own 1979 revolution.
items.summary_zh: 伊朗的统治者正面临着自1979年革命以来最严重的挑战。

items.title: Mortuary videos show how deadly Iran crackdown has become
items.title_zh: 迫击炮视频显示伊朗的镇压已变得多么致命。
items.summary: Anti-government protests have swept through major cities and towns across Iran, and the authorities are responding with a harsh crackdown.
items.summary_zh: 反政府抗议席卷了伊朗各地的大城市,当局正以严厉的镇压来回应.

items.title: Hungary grants asylum to Polish ex-justice minister
items.title_zh: 匈牙利向波兰前司法部长提供庇护
items.summary: Hungary has granted political asylum to Poland's former Justice Minister Zbigniew Ziobro who is facing charges of embezzlement.
items.summary_zh: 匈牙利向波兰前司法部长兹比格涅夫·齐奥布罗提供了政治庇护,他正面临贪污的指控。

items.title: Jailed Venezuelan politician's son says Trump shouldn't be 'fooled' by pledge of prisoner releases
items.title_zh: 被囚禁的委内瑞拉政治家的儿子说特朗普不应该因为保证释放囚犯而被"愚弄".
items.summary: The son of a jailed Venezuelan opposition leader has warned Donald Trump to "not be fooled" by the country's government, amid accusations it has not kept its promise to release a significant number of political prisoners.
items.summary_zh: 一名被监禁的委内瑞拉反对派领袖之子曾警告唐纳德·特朗普"不被政府所愚弄",在指责下,政府没有兑现释放大量政治犯的承诺.

items.title: Custody extended for owner of Swiss ski bar after deadly fire
items.title_zh: 致命火灾后,瑞士滑雪酒吧老板的监护权延长
items.summary: A judge in Switzerland has ordered that one of the two co-owners of the ski resort bar where 40 people died in a fire on New Year's Eve be kept in detention for 90 days.
items.summary_zh: 瑞士一名法官下令将滑雪胜地酒吧的两名共有者之一拘留90天,那里有40人在除夕夜的火灾中死亡.

items.title: Watch: Moment skier and dog swept along by avalanche
items.title_zh: 看:滑雪运动员和狗被雪崩卷走
items.summary: Footage recorded by Spanish skier Ares Masip shows the moment she was swept by an avalanche on Pic de l'Hortell, a mountain in Andorra.
items.summary_zh: 西班牙滑雪运动员阿雷斯·马西普(Ares Masip)所记录的足迹显示,她在安道尔的一座山上被雪崩所席卷。

items.title: Thousands of tourists stranded in Lapland as cold grounds flights
items.title_zh: 数以千计的游客被滞留在拉普兰作为冷地飞行
items.summary: Thousands of tourists have been stranded in Finland's Lapland as a severe cold spell has grounded flights out of one of its airports.
items.summary_zh: 数以千计的游客被困在芬兰的拉普兰,

items.title: Ai, Japanese chimpanzee who counted and painted, dies at 49
items.title_zh: 爱 有日本黑猩猩 数到四十九就死了
items.summary: Ai, a female chimpanzee famous for her cognitive skills has died at 49, according to the Japanese institute where she lived.
items.summary_zh: 爱 根据她所住的日本研究所,一位以认知能力出名的女性黑猩猩已死亡49岁.

items.title: Watch: Timothée Chalamet, Teyana Taylor, Adolescence and other highlights from the Golden Globes
items.title_zh: 观察:蒂莫泰·查拉梅特,泰亚娜·泰勒,青少年等出自"金球会"的要闻.
items.summary: The biggest names in film and TV gathered to officially kick off Hollywood's awards season at the 83rd Golden Globe Awards, hosted by comedian Nikki Glaser in California.
items.summary_zh: 第83届金球奖颁奖典礼上,由喜剧演员尼基·格拉泽(Nikki Glaser)在加利福尼亚州主持,电影和电视上最大的名字聚集一堂,正式踢出好莱坞的颁奖季.

items.title: Chalamet beats DiCaprio to Golden Globes glory
items.title_zh: 查拉梅特击败迪卡普里奥夺得金球奖
items.summary: Timothée Chalamet was among the main winners as Hollywood's finest gathered for this year's Golden Globe Awards.
items.summary_zh: Timothée Chalamet是好莱坞年度金球奖最佳获奖者之一。

items.title: Meta blocks 550,000 accounts under Australia's social media ban
items.title_zh: Meta块55万个账户,
items.summary: About 550,000 accounts were blocked by Meta during the first days of Australia's landmark social media ban for kids.
items.summary_zh: 大约55万个账户在澳洲标志性社交媒体禁止孩子的第一天被Meta封锁.

items.title: One person dead and 300 buildings destroyed in Australia bushfires
items.title_zh: 澳大利亚丛林大火造成一人死亡和300所建筑物被摧毁
items.summary: One person has died and 300 properties have been destroyed in bushfires that have torn across south-east Australia.
items.summary_zh: 在横跨澳大利亚东南部的丛林大火中,1人死亡,300个财产被摧毁。

items.title: Watch: Backlash against Musk's Grok AI explained
items.title_zh: 观察:反对穆斯克的Grok AI解释
items.summary: The UK government says X limiting Grok AI image edits to users who pay a monthly fee is "insulting" to victims of misogyny and sexual violence.
items.summary_zh: 英国政府表示,X将Grok AI的图像编辑限制在每月付费的用户是"侮辱"厌恶女性和性暴力的受害者.

items.title: Why are there huge protests going on in Iran?
items.title_zh: 伊朗为何举行大规模抗议?
items.summary: Anti-government protests have continued in Iran for the 13th day in a row.
items.summary_zh: 伊朗连续13天持续进行反政府抗议.

items.title: 'He's crazy': BBC speaks to Greenlanders about Trump's threats
items.title_zh: "他疯了":BBC向格陵兰人讲述特朗普的威胁
items.summary: This week, Donald Trump repeated his desire to take over Greenland and make it part of the United States, potentially by using military force.
items.summary_zh: 本周,唐纳德·特朗普(Donald Trump)再次表示希望占领格陵兰并使之成为美国的一部分,可能通过使用军事力量.
